mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.scr_name AS "scrName", a.scr_status AS "scrStatus", a.scr_industry AS "scrIndustry", a.scr_content AS "scrContent", a.scr_market AS "scrMarket", a.scr_coop_method AS "scrCoopMethod", a.scr_expiry_date AS "scrExpiryDate", a.scr_company_name AS "scrCompanyName", a.scr_company_contact AS "scrCompanyContact", a.scr_company_phone AS "scrCompanyPhone", a.scr_company_email AS "scrCompanyEmail", a.scr_files AS "scrFiles", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.scr_rec_teach_id AS "scrRecTeachId", a.scr_rec_comment AS "scrRecComment", a.scr_final_comment AS "scrFinalComment"
JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = u.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sch_comp_req( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, scr_name, scr_status, scr_industry, scr_content, scr_market, scr_coop_method, scr_expiry_date, scr_company_name, scr_company_contact, scr_company_phone, scr_company_email, scr_files ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{scrName}, #{scrStatus}, #{scrIndustry}, #{scrContent}, #{scrMarket}, #{scrCoopMethod}, #{scrExpiryDate}, #{scrCompanyName}, #{scrCompanyContact}, #{scrCompanyPhone}, #{scrCompanyEmail}, #{scrFiles} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sch_comp_req SET scr_name = #{scrName}, scr_status = #{scrStatus}, scr_industry = #{scrIndustry}, scr_content = #{scrContent}, scr_market = #{scrMarket}, scr_coop_method = #{scrCoopMethod}, scr_expiry_date = #{scrExpiryDate}, scr_company_name = #{scrCompanyName}, scr_company_contact = #{scrCompanyContact}, scr_company_phone = #{scrCompanyPhone}, scr_company_email = #{scrCompanyEmail}, scr_files = #{scrFiles} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sch_comp_req SET SCR_REC_TEACH_ID = #{scrRecTeachId}, SCR_REC_COMMENT = #{scrRecComment}, scr_status = #{scrStatus}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
